price: 77. Diggah usun yok qaduwwiiy ken maqbuda, kinnih immay anu aqbudem ginô Rabbi kinni, usuk addunyaa kee akeeral yok awlaytu.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
